title: Why Draymond Green May Soon Be the Odd Man Out at Golden State
description: The shadow of Green’s punch looms over the team, even as Golden State shows it still has what it takes to compete for a championship.
dc:creator: Sopan Deb
media:description: Draymond Green has been key to Golden State’s last four championships, but he may not be around for many more after his fight with his teammate Jordan Poole at a practice this month.
